content.text: Hi, my name is Maria. I'm Italian but I moved to America when I was 14.
Hi, I'm John. I'm from California. My parents are both school teachers.
Oh, that's cool. I like school teachers. My parents don't really speak English, so I had to learn it on my own.
That's impressive! I can only speak English and Spanish.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch NASCAR races, listen to pop music, and eat at McDonald's.
Oh, I've never been to a NASCAR race. I like to cook, and I love to go to the beach.
That's cool. I've never been to the beach. I've always wanted to go to Italy.
You should! It's beautiful. And the food is amazing.
Thanks for the conversation, Maria. It was nice to meet you.
You too, John. Have a nice day!
